name: Honey-Glazed Carrots

ingredients.ingredient: carrots, peeled and sliced on a diagonal

instructions: Add carrots, butter, honey, and a splash of water to a skillet over medium heat.
Cover and cook for 6–8 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the carrots are almost tender.
Remove the lid and continue cooking for another 3–4 minutes to reduce the liquid and glaze the carrots.
Season with a pinch of salt and serve warm.

storage_tips.refrigeration: Store leftovers in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 4 days. Reheat gently in a skillet or microwave.
storage_tips.freezing: Not recommended—carrots may become mushy and the glaze can separate.
storage_tips.make_ahead: Can be made a few hours ahead and gently reheated before serving.
